timeline.body: Issue says there should be no space. I was under the impression enums display name should be the same as the class name.

timeline.bodyHTML:
It seems to me all this could be reduced to:

} else if (fieldClass.isEnum()) {
  result = fieldClass.getSimpleName();
}
